content: shoulder for the front/back 176 216 stitches total 8 12 sts front 28 sts left shoulder same as for the right shoulder and the back same as for the front repeat the directions between four times on each round 3 separate body and sleeves round 1 k1 k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 1 st before next note on the next round we will place the sleeves stitches on a stitch marker k1 sm waste yarn remove the markers from the raglan and place one on each side repeat the directions between two times on each round 2 k1 yo k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 1 st before round next stitch marker yo k1 sm 8 sts increased next round using a tapestry needle and waste yarn place on hold round 3 k2 yo ssk k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 4 sts the sleeve sts 34 46 sts remove the next stitch marker k1 before next stitch marker k2tog yo k2 sm k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 1 st before next stitch marker round 4 k1 yo k3 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 4 sts k1 sm before next stitch marker k3 yo k1 sm 8 sts increased mykonos sweater by romi- dame la lata march 2023 page 3 next round k1 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 1 st before next round 2 k1 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 1 st before end stitch marker k1 sm k1 sm round 1 k1 yo ssk k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 3 sts round 3 k1 yo ssk k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 3 sts before before next stitch marker k2tog yo k1 sm end k2tog yo k1 sm round 2 k3 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 3 sts before next round 4 k3 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 3 sts before end stitch marker k3 sm k3 sm round 3 k1 k2tog yo twice ssk repeat until 1 st before next repeat rounds 1 to 4 thirteen more times stitch marker k1 sm next round knit all stitches round 4 k1 k1 k1-p1 into yo k1 repeat until 1 st before next repeat the last round stitch marker k1 sm bind off all stitches repeat rounds 1 to 4 three four more times round 1 k1 p1 until end of round next round knit all stitches bind off all stitches repeat the last round bind off all stitches 5 finishing using a tapestry needle weave in all ends you can use the yarn tails 4 sleeves to close the holes in the armholes note both sleeves are worked in the same way in rounds soak rinse and drain carefully and without twisting the fabric put place the sleeve stitches on hold back on the needles place a stitch to dry on a flat surface shaping the sweater marker at the beginning of the round work as follow round 1 k1 k2tog yo twice ssk repeat
